name: The Magical Item #12: Sejen: The Monstrous Prison
description: The Jaru Fairy lost the battle of Fairies in Machkal and was escorted to Sejen, the 12th Magical Location. Dino decided to save his companion, but got caught by one of the guardians. The prison cells are Animal Beasts or Fairies that lost in previous battles. These corpses feed on the spiritual energy generated by the prisoners, and are now controlled by the Froggo Unit (F-U). The General commander of F-U is Dofda, she orchestrates all the operations from the command center. During the 3300 Energy Crisis, she came up with the idea of the Fairy fights, to capture them and generate energy for the whole city. Unlocking this Magical Item will increase your Perseverance Attribute by 710 MPs.
